predicate.note: Frames file for 'paraphrase' based on sentences in ebc. No Verbnet entry. Comparison to 'summarize'.

example.name: restate
example.text: He says that the b- uh basic -- and I'm praphrasing that basically the the element of surprise what the enemy does not know *T*-1 about what we're going *-2 to do *T*-3 to them is a very powerful tool.
